about_the_game:
Ego In A Coma is 2D Action Sword Fighting Game.
Player can use several weapon to beat enemies.
This game has 5 stages and multi endings.

Each stage has different concept like Cyberpunk, Dark Fantasy, Digital World, and Psychedelic World.

It contains violence, gore, nudity, and sexual content.

Story :
A world... where the existence of ego has faded
One day, the One of Insomnia received a powerful sleeping pill.
She swallowed the pill in the bathtub... and fell into a coma,
Can the One who has fallen into the spiritual world escape from coma?
Can the ego grow after getting out?

content_descriptors.notes:
It contains violence, gore, nudity and sexual content.
It also has sensitive topic like abusing drug and sexual assult.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

name: Ego In A Coma (自我、状態、昏睡。)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
